title: (x) idiosyncratic "Imagine" - Airboy {Alan (self)}
content:
What is the typeface for the word "imagine"? You can view it in the attachmentment or online at [www.crystalstairs.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021002231/http:/www.crystalstairs.org/ "www.crystalstairs.org"). Apparently it is a font as I have a brochure with it used as the headline face throughout.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cs\_av2005a.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021002231/http:/typophile.com/files/cs_av2005a.gif) | 26.88 KB |
author: homeboy

comments.content: Found it. It's called Airboy. Thanks to all for looking.
